Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.session

Interface ClusterContainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container
    public interface ClusterContainer
    Interface providing cluster configuration from the servlet container.

    This interface is implemented by the servlet container to provide cluster configuration and context lookup for distributed session replication. It allows the session package to work with the container without a direct dependency on the Container class.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getClusterGroupAddress()
      Returns the multicast group address for cluster discovery.
      byte[] getClusterKey()
      Returns the shared secret key for cluster encryption.
      int getClusterPort()
      Returns the port used for cluster communication.
      SessionContext getContextByDigest​(byte[] digest)
      Looks up a context by its digest.
      java.lang.Iterable<SessionContext> getDistributableContexts()
      Returns all contexts that have distributable sessions.

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterPort

        int getClusterPort()
        Returns the port used for cluster communication.
        Returns:
        the cluster port number

      • getClusterGroupAddress

        java.lang.String getClusterGroupAddress()
        Returns the multicast group address for cluster discovery.
        Returns:
        the multicast group address (e.g., "224.0.80.80")

      • getClusterKey

        byte[] getClusterKey()
        Returns the shared secret key for cluster encryption. The key must be 32 bytes (256 bits) for AES-256.
        Returns:
        the cluster encryption key, or null if clustering is disabled

      • getContextByDigest

        SessionContext getContextByDigest​(byte[] digest)
        Looks up a context by its digest. Used to route incoming cluster messages to the correct context.
        Parameters:
        digest - the context digest to look up
        Returns:
        the matching SessionContext, or null if not found

      • getDistributableContexts

        java.lang.Iterable<SessionContext> getDistributableContexts()
        Returns all contexts that have distributable sessions. Used when a new node joins the cluster and needs all sessions.
        Returns:
        iterable of distributable session contexts
